short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display heights of people who have sent the problem displayed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads the heights of users that have logged the particular climb you are looking at on 8a, if those users have provided their height. Also shows the shortest logged send height for that climb.
